content.title: Incredible! Thanks to you, we've reached the stretch goal!
content.creator:
Wekos
March 4, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We can hardly believe it, but thanks to your fantastic support, we have already reached our stretch goal. This means that we will use the injection molding process for the Doze case instead of a printing process.
We are very grateful for your continued support.
To give you, our Backers, a first impression of Doze and its capabilities, we have uploaded a short video. This video showcases Doze with a radioactive test body and the measurements it takes.
You can view the original video, which includes the audio of the individual clicks, here:
The Wekos Team

content.title: Doze was funded! We are completely over the moon!
content.creator:
Wekos
March 1, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,

You are fantastic! Doze was funded in only 36 hours! With your help, we are one step closer to making our dream a reality. We started with the idea of enabling people to measure nuclear radiation with a device that is not bulky but simply fits in your pocket. Now, we cannot wait to successfully finish this project and see you holding Doze in your own hands!

We will keep you updated as we move forward. 
Stay safe! 

The Wekos Team
